statements: SELECT * FROM audience_segmentation WHERE audience_id = 1;
SELECT audience_name, interests FROM audience_segmentation WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM audience_segmentation WHERE age_range = '18-24' AND interests LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT audience_id, age_range FROM audience_segmentation WHERE audience_name = 'Sports Fans';
SELECT * FROM audience_segmentation ORDER BY location DESC, age_range ASC;
SELECT * FROM audience_segmentation WHERE age_range = '18-25' ORDER BY audience_name DESC;
SELECT audience_name, location FROM audience_segmentation WHERE interests LIKE '%technology%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT audience_id, interests, location FROM audience_segmentation WHERE age_range IN ('18-25', '26-35') ORDER BY audience_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_segments FROM audience_segmentation WHERE location = 'US';
SELECT MAX(audience_id) AS max_audience_id, MIN(audience_id) AS min_audience_id FROM audience_segmentation;
SELECT * FROM AudienceSegments;
SELECT segment_name, audience_size FROM AudienceSegments ORDER BY audience_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM AudienceMembers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT member_name, email FROM AudienceMembers WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT segment_name, description FROM AudienceSegments WHERE audience_size > 50000;
SELECT * FROM AudienceSegments WHERE audience_size > 1000 ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT segment_name, audience_size FROM AudienceSegments WHERE description LIKE '%target audience%' ORDER BY audience_size DESC;

SELECT segment_name, count(*) AS total_members FROM AudienceSegments JOIN AudienceMembers ON AudienceSegments.segment_id = AudienceMembers.segment_id GROUP BY segment_name HAVING total_members > 500 ORDER BY total_members DESC;

SELECT segment_name, member_name, email, age, gender FROM AudienceSegments JOIN AudienceMembers ON AudienceSegments.segment_id = AudienceMembers.segment_id WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY segment_name ASC, age DESC;

SELECT segment_name, AVG(age) AS avg_age, COUNT(*) AS total_members FROM AudienceSegments JOIN AudienceMembers ON AudienceSegments.segment_id = AudienceMembers.segment_id WHERE gender = 'Female' GROUP BY segment_name ORDER BY avg_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM AudienceSegments;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM AudienceSegments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SegmentMembers WHERE segment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT member_id, join_date FROM SegmentMembers WHERE join_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT segment_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM SegmentMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM AudienceSegments WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM AudienceSegments ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SegmentMembers JOIN AudienceSegments ON SegmentMembers.segment_id = AudienceSegments.id;
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) AS member_count FROM AudienceSegments JOIN SegmentMembers ON AudienceSegments.id = SegmentMembers.segment_id GROUP BY segment_name ORDER BY member_count DESC;
SELECT SegmentMetrics.segment_id, COUNT(*) AS metric_count FROM SegmentMetrics GROUP BY SegmentMetrics.segment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY metric_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM AudienceSegments;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, description FROM AudienceSegments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SegmentAttributes ORDER BY attribute_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, description FROM AudienceSegments WHERE segment_id = 2 OR segment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM AudienceSegments;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, description FROM AudienceSegments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT Users.user_id, Users.username, SegmentMembership.segment_id FROM Users JOIN SegmentMembership ON Users.user_id = SegmentMembership.member_id;

SELECT Users.username, Users.email, Users.gender, AudienceSegments.segment_name FROM Users, AudienceSegments, SegmentMembership WHERE Users.user_id = SegmentMembership.member_id AND AudienceSegments.segment_id = SegmentMembership.segment_id;

SELECT Users.username, Users.age, SegmentAttributes.attribute_name FROM Users JOIN SegmentMembership ON Users.user_id = SegmentMembership.member_id JOIN SegmentAttributes ON SegmentMembership.segment_id = SegmentAttributes.attribute_id;
SELECT * FROM audience_segments;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM audience_segments;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM audience_members;
SELECT age, gender, income FROM demographics;
SELECT country, city, postal_code FROM location_data;
SELECT * FROM audience_segments WHERE segment_name = 'Active Users';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM audience_segments WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM audience_members WHERE segment_id = 2 ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT age, gender, income FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age ASC, income DESC;
SELECT country, city, postal_code FROM location_data WHERE country = 'USA' AND city LIKE 'New%';
